Gaussian-quadrature based implementation of Design

Source: R/GQDesign.R
GQDesign-class.Rd

Implements a class for two-stage designs where n2 and c2 are approximated by linear interpolation of pivot points and integration is handled via Gaussian quadrature rules. The pivots are chosen to be the evaluation points of the selected Gaussian quadrature rule and guarantee a stable evaluation during optimization.

[TODO: implement a constructor taking in n2 and c2 functions?]

GQDesign(n1, c1f, c1e, n2_pivots, c2_pivots, order)

# S4 method for GQDesign
update(object, params, ...)

# S4 method for GQDesign
n1(d, ...)

# S4 method for GQDesign
get_knots(d, ...)

# S4 method for GQDesign,numeric
n2(d, x1, ...)

# S4 method for GQDesign,numeric
c2(d, x1, ...)

# S4 method for GQDesign
as.numeric(x, ...)

Arguments

n1

stage-one sample size
c1f

early stopping for futility boundary
c1e

early stopping for efficacy boundary
n2_pivots

vector of length order giving the values of n2 at the pivot points of the Gaussian quadrature rule [TODO: these are not available during construction]
c2_pivots

vector of length order giving the values of c2 at the pivot points of the Gaussian quadrature rule [TODO: these are not available during construction]
order

order (i.e. number of pivot points in the interior of [c1f, c1e]) of the Gaussian quadrature rule to use for integration
object

GQDesign to update with given parameter values.
d

object of class GQDesign
x1

stage-one outcome
x

GQDesign

Methods (by generic)

  • update: return a new design object with parameters given by a single numeric vector of length 2*order + 3, inverse of as.numeric(design).

  • n1: stage-one sample size

  • get_knots: get the pivots points (knots) of the Gaussian quadrature rule.

  • n2: stage-two sample size by linear interpolation of n2_pivots

  • c2: stage-two critical value by linear interpolation of n2_pivots

  • as.numeric: convert GQDesign to vector of tunable parameters via c(x@n1, x@c1f, x@c1e, x@n2_pivots, x@c2_pivots); inverse of update();

Slots

rule

data.frame, the integration rule, result of a call to gaussquad::legendre.quadrature.rules(order)[[order]]) during construction
